titleStmt.title: Certain selected odes of Horace, Englished; and their arguments annexed. VVith poems (antient and modern) of divers subiects, translated. Whereunto are added, both in Latin and English, sundry new epigrammes. Anagramms. Epitaphes
Carmina. English. Selections
titleStmt.author: Horace.
Ashmore, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H[umphrey] L[ownes] for Richard Moore; and are to be solde at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard, in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Translated and with additional verse by John Ashmore.
The words "epigrammes. Anagramms. Epitaphes." are bracketed together on the title page.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "B" between two woodcut ornaments.
"Epigrammes, epitaphes, anagrammes, and other poems of diuers subiects" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard, in Fleet-street
